name: day1
description: ## Day 1 - Understanding what is nodejs - Importing modules using require('http'), require('fs') - Creating a Server (Refer create-server.js) - Global Functions __dirname, __filename - reading a file synchronnously - reading a file asynchronously - writing a file - Exporting a module - Initializing package.json using npm --init - using node package manager - Understanding built in modules in node and external packages like express framework - Understanding what is express
